scripts.launch:ts: npm run build:ts && npm run launch:happ:ts
scripts.launch:kb: npm run build:kb && npm run launch:happ:kb
scripts.launch:happ:ts: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n 2 ./apps/launcher/workdir/talking-stickies.happ -w --ui-path apps/launcher/ui/public network mdns
scripts.launch:happ:kb: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n 1 ./apps/launcher-kanban/workdir/kanban.happ -w --ui-path apps/launcher-kanban/ui/public network mdns
scripts.start:ts: npm run build:ts && npm run start:agent:ts
scripts.start:kb: npm run build:kb && npm run start:agent:kb
scripts.start:playground: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent:playground
scripts.start:agent:ts: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:ts" "npm run dev:watch -w talking-stickies-app"
scripts.start:agent:kb: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:kb" "npm run dev:watch -w kanban-app"
scripts.start:agent:playground: cross-env UI_PORT=5000 APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:agent:multi: cross-env UI_PORT=$(port) APP_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:happ:ts: echo "starting hc instance: $APP_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/talking-stickies.happ --run=$APP_PORT -a talking-stickies$APP_PORT network mdns
scripts.start:happ:kb: echo "starting hc instance: $APP_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher-kanban/workdir/kanban.happ --run=$APP_PORT -a kanban$APP_PORT network mdns
scripts.package:applet: npm run build:ui && npm run package -w we-applet
scripts.package:launcher:ts: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz" -w talking-stickies-app && npm run package -w talking-stickies-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.package:launcher:kb: npm run build -w "@holo-host/boardz" -w kanban-app && npm run package -w kanban-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher-kanban/workdir
